Premkumar Masilamani

Human by birth, software engineer by career, photographer by interest and a poet by love.

Premkumar Masilamani is a care-free wandering soul searching the reason for his existence in human body. He admires love and write poems in tamil. He loves to read, write, speak, workout, travel, meet people and take pictures. He lived in Chennai, Bangalore, Kolkata, Florida, California, London and currently in Bangalore.
